name: Mr. Smith - Perion Glove Crafting NPC

listSelection.title: Um... Hi, I'm Mr. Thunder's apprentice. He's getting up there in age, so he handles most of the heavy-duty work while I handle some of the lighter jobs. What can I do for you?
Okay, so which glove do you want me to make?
Upgrade a glove? That shouldn't be too difficult. Which did you have in mind?
Materials? I know of a few materials that I can make for you...

choices.text: Make Processed Wood with Tree Branch

askNumber.text: So, you want me to make some #t4003001#s? In that case, how many do you want me to make?

askNumber.text: So, you want me to make some #t4003001#s? In that case, how many do you want me to make?

askNumber.text: So, you want me to make some #t4003000#s? In that case, how many packs do you want me to make?

dialogue.text: You want me to make {context.quantity} packs of #t4003000#s (15 screws each)? In that case, I'm going to need specific items from you in order to make it. Make sure you have room in your inventory, though!
I'm still an apprentice, I don't know if I can substitute other items in yet... Can you please bring what the recipe calls for?
Check your inventory for a free slot first.
I may still be an apprentice, but I do need to earn a living.
Did that come out right? Come by me again if you have anything for me to practice on.
